long_description: With a maximum output of 90 lumens to light the trail, help you find gear in your pack, or enhance safety after the sun goes down, the Black Diamond Spot headlamp makes any adventure brighter. Equipped with 1 high-power LED, 2 white proximity LEDs and 2 red proximity LEDs for amazing brightness and lighting versatility. Use the high-power LED for maximum light output of 90 lumens; the white and red proximity LEDs use less battery power and are ideal for use around camp. Strobe settings for both the white and red LEDs can be used to signal in the mountains or increase your visibility while walking or biking around town. Dimmer switch lets you choose the light output needed for the task at hand. Streamlined design sets the beam at an efficient illumination angle; ratcheting swivel head aims light where you need it. IPX4 water-resistant construction delivers reliability in inclement weather. Compact design fits securely around head with adjustable elastic band that won't pull hair. The Black Diamond Spot headlamp runs on 3 AAA batteries (included); battery compartment is just behind LEDs for a compact design. Closeout.
short_description: With a maximum output of 90 lumens to light the trail, help you find gear in your pack, or enhance safety after the sun goes down, the Black Diamond Spot headlamp makes any adventure brighter.
